description:
A tall sporty take on Ryder's classic Hillroy. Equipped NXT lenses with colourBOOST technology, you get improved clarity and contrast, as well as vibrant colour reproduction. Thermoplastic frames are super flexible, so they'll easily adhere to your face (and are less likely to snap). Grippy nose and temple pads keep them from falling in the drink.

  • Fits large to medium faces best
  • NXT® lens material offers improved clarity over standard polycarbonate lenses
  • ColourBoost™ lenses deliver vibrant colours and excellent contrast, making them a great choice for challenging light conditions
  • TR90 thermoplastic frames are flexible, durable and light
  • 6-base lens curve
  • Rubberized nose pads and temple tips
name: Ryders Eyewear Nelson Colourboost Sunglasses
